remarks: Lemma used to prove that every real is a limit point for the domain of the derivative of the periodic function to be approximated. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem41.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem41.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem41.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem41.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem41.dper $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( x + ( k x. T ) ) e. D ) $.
fourierdlem41.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem41.z $e |- Z = ( x e. RR |-> ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) $.
fourierdlem41.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( Z ` x ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem41.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem41.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem41.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem41.qssd $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) C_ D ) $.
fourierdlem41 $p |- ( ph -> ( E. y e. RR ( y < X /\ ( y (,) X ) C_ D ) /\ E. y e. RR ( X < y /\ ( X (,) y ) C_ D ) ) ) $.
